# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a snapshot

- **appendSections(_:)**: Adds the sections with the specified identifiers to the snapshot.
- **appendItems(_:toSection:)**: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the specified section of the snapshot.

items.description: Adds the sections with the specified identifiers to the snapshot.
items.name: appendSections(_:)

items.description: Adds the items with the specified identifiers to the specified section of the snapshot.
items.name: appendItems(_:toSection:)

title: init()
